title: Spare Hours
author: Brown, John
snippet: No more happy laughter from the two in the parlor, as hewas reading Larry, the Irish postboy's letter in Miss Edgeworth's tale,or the last Waverley novel; no more visitings in a cart with her, heriding beside us on his white thorough-bred pony, to Kilbucho, or RachanMill, or Kirklawhill.

title: Rab and his friends and other dogs and men,
author: Brown, John
snippet: No more happy laughter from the two in the parlor, as he was reading Larry, the Irish postboy's letter in Miss Edgeworth's tale, or the last Waverly novel ; no more visitings in a cart with her, he riding beside us on his white thorough-bred pony, to Kilbucho, or Rachan Mill, or Kirklawhill.
